summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4822 for the improvement of Sturgus Avenue South, from a point 181.07 feet south of Atlantic Street to Massachusetts Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55659, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
